string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_FIRE_DESC
string.body: Rough, wild and aggressive by nature, their harsh surroundings toughened the bodies of these people, and they have also gained the power of Fire from the elements.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_EARTH_DESC
string.body: A race consisting solely of males since the times of Ancient Elyos, they have obtained the power of Earth following the Cataclysm and have solid and unshakable strength.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WIND_DESC
string.body: Prolonged isolation has led to a highly developed culture for this race. They possess great agility as well as endurance and like to amuse themselves with adventures and hunts.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_LIGHT_DESC
string.body: A faction that inherited the most from Ancient Elyos in terms of appearance, they are a proud people who believe they are the Chosen ones as they resemble the Elyos and were mostly spared during the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WATER_DESC
string.body: They are a race of females who possess the greatest intellectual power among all races, and their evolution sacrificed much of their physical attributes in exchange for the ability to use magic at will.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WARRIOR
string.body: Warriors specialise in close combat, utilizing their great physical strength and prowess with melee weapons. Once a Warrior reaches a certain level of proficiency, they must choose the way of the Gladiator or the Templar.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_SCOUT
string.body: Scouts concern themselves with speed, agility, and awareness. They wear leather armour, making them vulnerable, so they specialise in hit and run tactics. A Scout will eventually become a Ranger or an Assassin.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CLERIC
string.body: Priests use divine power to heal and to bolster the defences of their allies. They can use both long-range spells and melee attacks to deliver pain to the enemy. Clerics must choose between the path of a Chanter or a Cleric.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_MAGE
string.body: Mages delight in dealing awe-inspiring levels of damage. Their command over the elements is terrifying, but they are relatively vulnerable so they must be clever to survive. Mages may choose the school of the Sorcerer or the Spiritmaster.

string.name: STR_OPTION_AUTODETECTING

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_SAME_EXIST_CHARACTERNAME
string.body: That name is already in use. Please enter another.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_INVAILD_CHARACTERNAME
string.body: The name you have entered is not allowed. Please enter another name.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CHOICE_CHARACTER_DELETE_CONFIRM
string.body: Are you sure you want to delete this character?

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_TIZERID
string.body: Traditionally famous for its mighty knights, this northern country is regarded as a powerful military state, but the barren lands and primitive state of its industries have left the country lagging furthest behind in terms of economy and wealth.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_FESRA
string.body: An eastern nation composed of several tribes, where the central government is weak and the tribal lifestyle is still maintained and emphasized. There exists agriculture and livestock farming industries based on its lush forests, but most of the produce go into feeding its citizens.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_EROLE
string.body: A nation located on the west of the Tower of Light, where the life of abstinence and celibacy is seen as ideal. A country full of devout priests of Aion, which also has the most developed economy thanks to a blessed environment.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_JUHDENIL
string.body: Developed by highly intellectual Water Elyos, this lowland country in the south boasts powerful magic and a high level of academia. It is where every Elyos who dreams of becoming a Sorcerer gathers from all over the world.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_RACE_NOT_READY
string.body: The selected faction is still being prepared.

string.name: STR_HELP_CONTENT2
string.body: Let's use a Combo. A skill is blinking on the Quickbar. This skill is used to activate the Chain Skill. Using skills in the order indicated by the arrow allows you to defeat enemies with overwhelming striking power.

string.name: STR_HELP_CONTENT4
string.body: Let's use a special attack. Select a target and use a special attack by clicking the skill indicated by the arrow on the skill window or on the Quickbar. With the special attack assistance skill, you can also transfer your DP to any group member who uses a special attack.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_SCAN

string.name: STR_FAQ_WEB_AIONPOWER_DESC
string.body: Find all the answers about Aion here! Click to open the Game Guide.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_SELF
string.body:
Upon your request, your account has been banned due to the regulations and policies of the company.

More information has been sent to your email address.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_SELF_AUTH_EXPECTED
string.body:
To reactivate this account please contact the support.

You can find further information in the following FAQ article http://www.aionfreetoplay.com/website/faq/item/account_10

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account requires identification.

Confirm your identity on the official Aion Support website (http://support.en.aionfreetoplay.com).

You can find further information on the official Aion Support website (http://support.en.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the AION service agreement. You used other's identity to create your account.

For more information, contact us on the official AION support website (http://support.en.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_PAY
string.body:
Your account has been temporarily suspended because past payments were not received.

Please contact support (https://billing.gameforge.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_HOUSE
string.body:
Your account has been banned due to spamming.

You can find further information on the official Aion Support website (http://support.en.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_AUTO
string.body:
Your account has been banned in accordance with the guidelines and user policies, because you used software that is not permitted for use in the game by the company.

More information has been sent to your email address.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_MANUAL
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement. You used illegal software in the game which is not permitted.

For more information, contact us on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_PERIOD
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 10 days because of the use of illegal software. A repeated violation in the future may lead to a permanent termination of your account.

For more information, contact us by using the 1:1 Petition on the Aion official website (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_7
string.body:
Your account has been locked for 7 days for unauthorised trading.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_30
string.body:
Your account has been locked for 30 days for unauthorised trading.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been locked for carrying out at least 3 unauthorised trades.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT_30
string.body:
Your account has been locked for 30 days for unauthorised trading.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been locked for carrying out at least 2 unauthorised trades.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_AGAIN
string.body:
Your account has been locked because you registered a fake incident or disrupted game play.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT
string.body:
Your account has been locked for trading with multiple accounts.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account has been banned due to account theft.

If you have given us an e-mail address, we have sent you a notification.

If you are not involved in account theft, please let us know on the official Aion Support website (http://support.en.aionfreetoplay.com). You can find further information from the Customer Centre.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_LIE
string.body:
Your account has been banned in accordance with our principles regarding the reporting of account theft, because you falsely reported the theft of an account.

Falsely reporting account theft can be damaging to other players.

You can find further information on the official Aion Support website (http://support.en.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_NO_CONFIRM
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because your account theft report was determined to be false as you didn't confirm your identity within 7 days after the account theft report.

But, if you confirm your identity within 30 days after the report, we will proceed with the investigation of your report normally. So, please do so at the customer centre on the AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD
string.body:
Your account has been locked for attempted fraud or illegal conduct.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_7
string.body:
Your account has been locked for attempted fraud or illegal conduct.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been locked for attempted fraud or illegal conduct.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE
string.body:
Your account has been locked for illegal gambling.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_30
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 30 days due to illegal gambling.

You can find further information on the official Aion Support website (http://support.en.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been locked for illegal gambling.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement and the company's operation policy because you used illegal software, which is not permitted.

For more information, contact us by using the 1:1 Petition on the Aion official website (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE
string.body:
Your account has been banned due to security reasons.

More information has been sent to your email address.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_LIGHT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement because you either abused the system or directly affected the game in a wrongful way.

For more information, contact us by using the 1:1 Petition on the Aion official website (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_SERIOUS
string.body:
Your account has been locked for the abuse of system errors.

This abuse can lead to technical problems or disruptions to the balance of the game.

Please contact AION Support for any further questions (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_OBSTRUCT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the AION service agreement. You committed or tried to commit an act that obstructs public safety or goes against the social order.

For more information, contact us on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BAD_LANGUAGE
string.body:
Your account has been locked for inappropriate language/verbal abuse.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BAD_PROGRAM_BUT_BOT
string.body:
Your account has been banned for a year due to the use of illegal programmes.

You can find further information on the official Aion Support website (http://support.en.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PRETEND_INSIDER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the AION service agreement. You were found to have impersonated a game master (GM), an employee of the company, or the company itself.

For more information, contact us on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PLAY_ABNORMAL
string.body:
Your account has been temporarily locked because you are suspected of having used unauthorised methods.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BUNDLE
string.body:
Your account has been temporarily banned due to a breech against the AION Free-to-Play game rules.

More information has been sent to your email address.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ETC
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you breached the AION game service agreement or the company's operation policy.

For more information about the account suspension, contact us by visiting the AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_EXTERNAL_REQUEST
string.body:
Your account has been suspended by an official request from a law enforcement agency.

This action was taken because an official request from such a body has legal implications. For more information, contact us on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_UNPAIED
string.body:
Your account has been locked because of an outstanding payment.

Please contact AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_DETOUR_IP
string.body:
Your account has been temporarily locked because you are suspected of having used someone else's identity.

If this is not the case, you will be able to play again shortly.

If this is the case, please contact AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_MSG_AUTH_CONNECTION_FAIL
string.body: Cannot connect to the authorization server.

string.name: STR_SOCK_ERR_BAD_VERSION
string.body: The version of winsock.dll is not correct.

string.name: STR_CHARACTER_DELETE_OBT
string.body: Are you sure you want to delete this character?

string.name: STR_MSG_AUTO_DISCONNECTED
string.body: You have been disconnected due to being AFK for a long time.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_S_AGREE_GAME
string.body:
Your account has not been verified.

Please identify yourself on the Aion Free-to-Play website (www.aionfreetoplay.com) and start again.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_S_EXCEED_CONCURRENT_PLAY_LIMIT
string.body: Exceeded the maximum number of simultaneously connected accounts for a user.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_S_EXTERNAL_AUTH_BLOCKED
string.body: If you use an external account, you are blocked in the external authorization system.

string.name: STR_UI_ABYSS_USER_RANK_DEFAULT_MSG
string.body: No character has collected enough Honour Points so far.

string.name: STR_UI_ABYSS_LEGION_RANK_DEFAULT_MSG
string.body: No Legion has yet accumulated enough contribution points.

string.name: STR_RACE_RESTRICT_ALL
string.body:
New players cannot create characters on that server.
If you already have a character on that server, you may create additional characters of the same race.

string.name: STR_RACE_RESTRICT_ONE
string.body:
You cannot create an %1 character on that server.
If you already have a character on that server, you can create additional characters of the same race.

string.name: STR_BLOCK_PC_ROOM_COMPLAIN
string.body:
We store all account information and logs.
We have received a report that you logged into Aion from an internet cafe and deliberately left without paying.
Using an internet cafe without the intention or ability to pay for the service is theft, and, as such, is a violation of the law.
If you had nothing to do with this act, please contact us.
You can contact us any time on the official website www.aionfreetoplay.com to find out more details.

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_SELF
string.body:
All game services using this account have been suspended upon your request.
You can find further information on the official Aion Support website (http://support.en.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_AUTO
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used unauthorized software in the game.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_MANUAL
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used unauthorized software in the game.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_PERIOD
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 10 days because you used unauthorized software in the game.
Your account will be permanently terminated if the same violation occurs again. For more information, contact us using the support form on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT
string.body:
Your account was involved in account trading. All game services using the account have been suspended.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_PAY
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used another's payment information fraudulently.
For more information, contact our customer centre at http://aionfreetoplay.com.

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used another's identity to create your account.
If this is not the case, verify your identity through our website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_HOUSE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used the game service for commercial purposes.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BAD_BOARDER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you regularly made posts on official Gameforge websites that were in violation of the End User License Agreement.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_VIOLATION
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you were involved in illegal activity while using the game service.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_ABUSE_COIN
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the End User License agreement. You were involved in an unauthorized use of AION Coins.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official AION website (http://www.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_ABUSE_FREE_COIN
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the End User License agreement. You were involved in an unauthorized use of AION Coins.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BAD_PROGRAM
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operation policy because you performed inappropriate activities that the Gameforge service doesn't allow in order to obtain undisclosed information or alter our game client.
For more information, contact our customer centre at the AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_VIRUS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operation policy because you were involved in the use or distribution of illegal software that can harm our services, other companies' services, or users' computers.
For more information, contact our customer centre at the AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement. You used another's identity to create your account.
For more information, contact our customer centre at the AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_LOGIN_ERROR_EXCEED_MAX_CHAR_COUNT
string.body: You have exceeded the number of characters allowed per account, and must delete some characters before you can play. If you have transferred to a different server, please try logging in on the previous server, and then again on the new server.

string.body:
We store all account information and logs.
We have received a report that you logged into AION from an internet cafe and deliberately left without paying.
Using an internet cafe without the intention or ability to pay for the service is theft, and, as such, is a violation of the law.
If you had nothing to do with this act, please contact us.
You can contact us any time on the official website www.aionfreetoplay.com to find out more details.

string.name: STR_EDIT_CHAR_GENDER_CONFIRM
string.body:
Pressing OK changes your face, body frame and gender to the currently selected options.

Will you change to this appearance and gender?

string.name: STR_EDIT_CHAR_GENDER_CANT_NO_ITEM
string.body: You can only use this when you have a Gender Switch Ticket.

STR_HTML_SELECT_SEL_EXTRA_REWARD_HEAD
STR_HTML_QUEST_SEL_EXTRA_REWARD_HEAD

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_PROGRAM
string.body:
Your account has been temporarily locked because you are suspected of having used illegal bot programs.

If this presumption is unfounded, you will be able to play again shortly.

If this is the case, please contact AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_ALARM_VIRUS_INFECTION
string.body: Your PC has a high likelihood of getting hacked into or infected by viruses.\n Install vaccines to scan your computer, and use appropriate security services.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_SLAYER_LIGHT_G2_BODY
string.body: You have attained the status of Cruel Conqueror because you defeated a lot of opponents in the enemy area.\nYou now have the following advantage in the Asmodian area: [color:PvPAttack 2%;0.2 1 0.2].

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_SLAYER_DARK_G1_BODY
string.body: You have attained the status of Conqueror because you have defeated the opponents in the enemy area.\nYou now have the following advantage in the Elyos area: [color:PvPAttack 1%;0.2 1 0.2].

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_SLAYER_DARK_G2_BODY
string.body: You have attained the status of Cruel Conqueror because you have defeated lots of opponents in the enemy area.\nYou now have the following advantage in the Elyos area: [color:PvPAttack 2%;0.2 1 0.2].

string.name: STR_MSG_ERROR_REPORT_SEND_AGREE
string.body:
Send an error report of the Aion client automatically to the NCSOFT's error reporting server?

An error report contains information on the status of Aion, hardware configuration and other data at the time of error. The error report may contain personal information, but is not used by NCsoft.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHFAILED
string.body: The authentication number is incorrect. Please check the number once again.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_IVRNOTAVAILABLE
string.body: Telephone authentication service is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHTIMEOUT
string.body: The input time for the ARS number has expired.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_PHONENOTAVAILABLE
string.body: The telephone authentication service is unavailable as there is no phone connection or the line is busy. Please try again after moving to where there is phone connection or hanging up the phone.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_INVALIDCUSTOMERINFO
string.body: The telephone number is incorrect. Please check your registration information.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_NOTAVAILABLE
string.body: Telephone authentication service is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_TOOBUSY2
string.body: The telephone authentication service is currently unavailable due to a high customer demand. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_NOTPAID
string.body: Telephone authentication service period has expired. Please try again after you have paid for the service.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHBLOCKEDTEMP
string.body: Telephone authentication service is blocked due to repeated telephone authentication failures. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_CALLLIMITEXCEEDED
string.body: You have exceeded the number of times you can use the telephone authentication service in one day.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHALREADYINPROCESS
string.body: The telephone authentication service is currently in progress. Please wait a moment.

string.name: STR_ERR_CANT_EXECUTE_MORE_GAME
string.body: You cannot run any more client.

string.name: STR_ERR_CANT_EXECUTE_FOR_RESTRICTED_NATION
string.body: You have limited access and the connection with the server is being closed.

string.name: STR_OPTION_AV_INFO_VSYNC
string.body: The client must be restarted to apply the selected setting.\nTurning it on reduces the screen distortion in full screen mode.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_PCINFO_INVALID_REGISTER_PC
string.body: This computer has not subscribed to the PC registration service.

string.body:
Telephone authentication in progress...

Please check the authentication request call.

string.name: STR_USER_KICKED_BY_TIMEOUT
string.body: Connection has timed out. Please take a break.

string.body: Can be used by level %0 or below

string.body: Can be used by %0s of level %1 or below

To recover to the original state, you need to chant spells to purify the poision.

Enter the spells you see below in the correct order.

string.body: You failed the Security Card Authentication and the game is shutting down.

string.name: STR_ECARD_ENTER_INVALID
string.body: You entered the wrong number. You have %num0 attempts left.

string.body: A PS/2 key logger has been detected.

string.name: STR_KEYCRYPT_USBLOGGER

string.name: STR_KEYCRYPT_HHDUSBH
string.body: A HHD monitoring tool has been detected.

string.body: Please enter the password for the Security Card No, [%num0].

string.body: You failed the Security Card Authentication and the game is shutting down.

string.name: STR_SECURITYCARD_GAME_OVER
string.body: You have failed several times to enter the correct security card number, so your password has expired. Please change your password on the official AION website (http://aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_KICK_BOT_AUTO
string.body: An illegal program has been detected. Closing the game.

string.name: E_NCTASD_AUTHENTICATIONFAILED
string.body:
Authentication failed because you didn't enter the correct (or any) authentication number.

If you fail three consecutive times, your account will be blocked for 30 minutes.

string.name: E_NCTASD_IVRNOTAVAILABLE
string.body: The telephone authentication service is temporarily unavailable due to a problem with the telecommunication company. Please try again later.

string.name: E_NCTASD_AUTHENTICATIONTIMEOUT
string.body: The transmission is being delayed due to a problem with the telecommunication company. Please try again later.

string.name: E_NCTASD_PHONENOTAVAILABLE
string.body: Authentication failed because the line is engaged or the call is not being answered. Please try again later.

string.name: E_NCTASD_INVALIDCUSTOMERINFO
string.body:
The phone number for telephone authentication is either invalid or incorrect. Check your telephone authentication subscription information.

plaync>Security Center>Telephone Authentication Service

string.name: E_NCTASD_NOTAVAILABLE
string.body: The telephone authentication service is currently undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.

string.name: E_NCTASD_TOOBUSY2
string.body: The telephone authentication service is currently unavailable due to a high customer demand. Please try again later.

string.name: E_NCTASD_NOTPAID
string.body:
Your account is blocked because the telephone authentication service has expired. Please check your game access block settings.

plaync>Security Center>Telephone Authentication Service

string.name: E_NCTASD_AUTHENTICATIONBLOCKEDTEMPORALLY
string.body: Your game access is blocked because you failed the telephone authentication three consecutive times. Please try again later.

string.name: E_NCTASD_CALLLIMITEXCEEDED
string.body: You have exceeded the maximum number of telephone authentication attempts for today.

string.name: E_NCTASD_AUTHENTICATIONALREADYINPROCESS
string.body: The telephone authentication service is already in progress. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_AIONJEWEL_SHOP_BUY_CONFIRM
string.body: You need %num0 %1 to buy the item. Proceed with the purchase?

string.name: STR_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_PROTECT_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: To your Legion, for the successful defence of %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_AKS_ENTER_PK_SERVER
string.body: This game area is a free PK area. Abide by the rules and you will have a great gaming experience.

string.name: STR_NOTICE_MIXED_RACED_AFTER_SERVER_MERGE
string.body:
AION Free-to-Play was designed for players to play only one faction per server – the Asmodian or the Elyos. Because of the merge, it will however be temporarily possible to adventure with characters from both races on the same server. As soon as this phase ends, the old rules will apply once more. If you have still have characters from both factions on a server at this time, you will momentarily not be able to continue playing.


To prevent this, we ask that you move some of your heroes to an alternate server. To do so, simply use the free character transfer available on the official AION website.
Go to https://en.aion.gameforge.com/?link=ingame, log in using your account details and visit account management to access the character transfer option.


If you do not use the character transfer during the transfer phase, we will carry out an automatic transfer to ensure that you can continue playing. In this case, you will receive information from us in an email about the next steps.

All equipped items will be magically charged.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_DISRUPT_GAME_PLAY_3_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been locked for 3 days for abuse of the game system and harassing other players.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_DISRUPT_GAME_PLAY_7_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been locked for 7 days for abuse of the game system and harassing other players.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME_ACCOUNT
string.body:
Your account has been banned in accordance with company's Terms of Use due to identity theft.

You can find further information on the official Aion Support website (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PLAY_ABNORMAL_7_DAYS

Your account has been locked for 90 days for abusing system errors.

You can get further information from AION Support (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_30_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 30 days due to the abuse of system errors or similar.

The abuse of game errors can lead to a severe disruption of services as well as of the game balance.

You can find further information on the official Aion Support website (http://support.aionfreetoplay.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_1Y

Your account has been banned for 1 year due to the abuse of system errors or similar.

Instance in which you compete against another group for a limited time.

Each battle has a maximum of three rounds. Training is complete once the time has run out or one group has reached the required number of Victory Points.

All active boosting effects are lifted when entering the instance.

If the Portal Rift is closed, you will be transported to the resurrection bind location.

Notifications blocked

string.body: The [ncmsg:4;NC Register Friends] sent by [Info] was accepted.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_ESSENTIAL_DESC
string.body: - This is the data for the starting phase of the game. Therefore you cannot go beyond a certain level.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_ESSENTIAL_DESC
string.body: - The level restriction has been removed. You can now play in all regions.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_OBJECT_DESC
string.body: - Various styles of the low level costumes are displayed.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_OBJECT_DESC
string.body: - Various costume styles of various levels are displayed.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_MOVIE_DESC
string.body: - The intro video can be watched.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_MUSIC_DESC
string.body: - The background noise of the pre-set regions can be heard.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_MUSIC_DESC
string.body: - The background noise can be heard in all regions.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_L10N_DESC
string.body: - NPC dialogues and cutscenes can be heard in the pre-set areas.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_L10N_DESC
string.body: - NPC conversations and cutscenes can be heard in all regions.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_L10N_HELP_DESC
string.body: - The tutorial video can be watched.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_SOUND_VOICE_DESC
string.body: - The dialogues during combat can be heard even more clearly.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_SOUND_ETC_DESC
string.body: - Individual pets, cutscenes and surrounding noises can be heard.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_SOUND_ETC_DESC
string.body: - All pets, cutscenes and surrounding noises can be heard.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_ENV_DESC
string.body: - Colours and shading in pre-set areas become more intense.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_ENV_DESC
string.body: - Colours and shadows in all regions become more intense.

string.name: STR_ASK_REMOVE_BINDSTONE
string.body:
Re-installation will delete the previous Kisk.

Continue anyway?

string.name: STR_IDKAMAR_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
An instance in which a battle between the Elyos and the Asmodians will take place for a limited period of time.

Use of tanks or supplies and getting more points than the opposing side can lead to victory.

All enhancing effects will disappear upon entry.

string.body:
Do you want to wrap %0?

If you wrap %0, you can trade it one time only with other players or via Trade Brokers, your private shop or mail attachment.

Only a personal Kisk can be newly set up.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_Under_01_War_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
Elyos and Asmodians will face off for a limited time in this instance.

Capturing bases will get you points. You win if you gain more points that the opposing faction.

All enhancing effects are removed when entering the instance.

string.body:
Do you want to use %0 to reset the upgrade of %1?

string.body:
Elyos and Asmodians will face off for a limited time in this instance.

You win if you gain more points that the opposing faction.

All enhancing effects are removed when entering the instance.

string.body: If you play while in an Internet café, you will enjoy special benefits. You will receive %0%% additional XP and your chance of obtaining loot items will be increased by %1%%.

string.body:
Do you want to use %0% to reset the upgrade level of %1%?

The upgrade level of the target item will remain intact; only the upgrade status will be reset.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_INFO

Even if you do not use it, the amount of re-identifications possible will be reduced by one, and one re-identification item is used.

string.body: Even if you do not use the result, the amount of re-identifications and re-identification items will not be restored.

During Equipment Enhancement, enhancement information will be retained.

string.name: STR_GLOBAL_OPTION_DIALOG__NCPING_USER_AGREE
string.body:
AION Ping adjusts the technical settings (Register) to improve communication between the client and the server.

Using this function improves the reaction time in the game.

However, it is also possible that activating AION Ping during the game will reduce the network speed of other programs or interrupt these programs.

You can find more information on this function in the AION Ping settings guide.

string.body: Obtain the reward for\nthe current Enhancement Level\nby clicking on the corresponding button.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_GACHA_RETRY_BUTTON
string.body: Click on 'Chance' \nto resume at the failed level.\n This is only possible once per game.

string.name: STR_POPUP_GACHA_RETRY_CONFIRM
string.body:
For %0 %num1, you can continue from the failed level.

If you fail again, you will receive the reward for the last level you achieved.

Continue?

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_GACHA_REWARD_BUTTON
string.body: You can obtain the reward for\nthe current Enhancement Level\nby clicking on the corresponding button.

string.name: STR_POPUP_GACHA_FEVERTIME_CHECK
string.body:
Nyerk Fever has begun!

Your odds have increased and more valuable rewards are available.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_GAME
string.body:
1. Shugo Game

In this game, you can use one Shugo Game Token to enhance a weapon. You receive a reward according to the level reached.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_LUCKY
string.body:
2. Shugo Game Points

Obtain Shugo Game Points by using Shugo Game Tokens.

3. Nyerk Fever

Your Nyerk Fever begins when you have collected 100 Shugo Game Points. You can receive even more valuable rewards during this time.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_FAILURE
string.body:
4. Enhancement Failed

If the enhancement fails, you will receive a reward amount for the lowest enhancement level instead of your current level.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_BUTTON
string.body:
5. Continue/Stop Button

Click on the Continue Button to try a Weapon Boost. Click the Stop Button to receive the reward amount for the current Enhancement Level.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_RETRY
string.body:
6. Chance

If you fail, you can use additional tokens for a single chance to resume the game, starting at the level at which you failed. The number of tokens required to resume depends on the level. If you fail again, you will not receive the lowest-level reward but will receive the reward from the level from which you continued.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_GRADE
string.body:
7. Reward Chest

This chest contains precious rewards. You'll receive a box for one of the four different levels, depending on your current Enhancement Level. When you open it, it will reveal a random item.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ACTION_PET_PETBUFF
string.body: The Pet cheers its Master on non-stop. When it gets tired, it chows down on Aether Cherries. The amount of food they eat depends on the eating habits of each Pet.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_ATTACKDELAY
string.body: Attack speed. The lower the number, the faster the attack speed.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYATTACK
string.body: Power of the Physical Attack. The higher the number, the higher the attack power.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGATTACK
string.body: The power of a Magical Attack. The higher the number, the higher the attack power.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_HITACCURACY
string.body: The probability of hitting a target with a physical attack. The higher the number, the lower the probability that the target will Evade, Parry, or block with a Shield.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_CRITICAL
string.body: The likelihood of a Critical Strike. The higher the number, the higher your chances.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGBOOST
string.body: Skill that boosts the effect of a magical skill. The higher the number, the more powerful the magical skill.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGACCURACY
string.body: The probability of hitting a target with a magical skill. The higher the number, the lower the probability that the target will repel your attack with a magical skill.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGCRITICAL
string.body: The probability of a magical critical spell occurring. The higher the number, the higher the success rate of a Magical Critical Spell.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STA_HEAL_BOOST
string.body: Boost the HP Recovery effect. The higher the value, the more effective the regeneration skill.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_CASTINGTIME
string.body: The speed with which you conjure a magical skill. The lower the number, the faster the casting speed.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYDEFEND
string.body: Defence against Physical Attacks. The higher the number, the lower the damage inflicted by a physical attack.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_BLOCK
string.body: The probability that you repel an attack with a Shield. The higher the number, the higher your chances.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PARRY
string.body: The probability of deflecting an attack with a weapon. The higher the number, the more likely the attack can be successfully parried.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_DODGE
string.body: The probability of evading a physical attack. The higher the number, the higher your chances.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYSICAL_CRITICAL_REDUCE_RATE
string.body: Probability that a Physical Attack will not deal a Critical Strike. The higher the number, the less likely that the attacker will deal a Physical Critical Strike.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYSICAL_CRITICAL_DAMAGE_REDUCE
string.body: Defence against Physical Critical Attacks. The higher the number, the lower the power of the attacker's Physical Critical Strikes.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_NEW_DEFENCE
string.body: Probability of repelling Magical Attacks. The higher the number, the greater the probability of repelling an opponent's Magical Attack.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_SKILL_BOOST_RESIST
string.body: Reduces the Magic Boosts of opposing spells/magical skills. The higher the number, the stronger the chance is that the Magic Boost reduces the opposing magic spell.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGDEFEND
string.body: Balancing level for received Magical Skill boosts The higher the number, the less likely that the attacker will successfully add Magic Boost to a magical skill.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_CRITICAL_REDUCE_RATE
string.body: Probability that a Magical Attack will not deal a Critical Strike. The higher the number, the less likely that the attacker will deal a Magical Critical Spell.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_CRITICAL_DAMAGE_REDUCE
string.body: Defence against Magical Critical Attacks. The higher the number, the lower the power of the attacker's Critical Strikes.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_EXP_BOOST_DESC
string.body: The Energy of Growth is applied. While the effect lasts, your XP earned while hunting, gathering and handcrafting are increased by %0%%. When all the Energy of Growth is consumed, the effect vanishes.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT
string.body: •Use an Enchantment Stone to increase the boost level of weapons, armour and wings. A higher boost level also increases the item's values. The success rate can be increased with a socketing aid.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_EXCEED_ENCHANT
string.body: •Weapons, armour parts and wings that have reached the highest boost level can be boosted over the highest value.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT_OPTION
string.body: •If a Manastone is socketed to weapons or armour, the values of the weapons or armour increase. The Manastone level depends on the item to be boosted.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_PROC
string.body: •Divine power was bestowed upon the weapon.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_AUTHORIZE
string.body: •You can use Upgrade Serums to improve item skills. The higher the level of the Upgrade Serum, the better the values of the item.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_POLISH
string.body: •The power of Idian will be bestowed on the weapon. If you use weapons strengthened with Idian, this effect will disappear slowly. When all effects have been used, the Idian values will disappear.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_REIDENTIFY
string.body: •Weapons or armour that received random values during identification can be awarded new values through re-identification.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_CHARGE
string.body: •Blesses or upgrades weapons. The level will be determined according to the material used.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_EXTRACT
string.body: •When you extract an item, you obtain Magic Powder. The extracted item disappears.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_AP_EXTRACT
string.body: •Extract items to receive Abyss Points. The extracted item disappears.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_PACK
string.body: •You can trade non-tradeable items by rewrapping them. Wrapped items can be traded once.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_ENCHANT
string.body: •Please place the item to be buffed into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_EXCEED_ENCHANT
string.body: •Please place the item for which an evolution will be carried out into the appropriate evolution position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_ENCHANT_OPTION
string.body: •Please place the item whose Manastone will be buffed into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_PROC
string.body: •Please place the item whose GK will be buffed into the appropriate GK buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_AUTHORIZE
string.body: •Please place the item to be upgraded into the appropriate upgrade position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_POLISH
string.body: •Please place the item to which an Idian will be added into the appropriate Idian position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_REIDENTIFY
string.body: •Please place the item to be re-identified in the appropriate identification position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_CHARGE
string.body: •Please place the item to which magic or GK will be added into the appropriate magic or GK position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_EXTRACT
string.body: •Please place the item whose Enchantment Stone will be extracted into the appropriate extraction position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_AP_EXTRACT
string.body: •Please place the item from which Abyss Points will be extracted into the appropriate extraction position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_DYE
string.body: •Please place the item to be dyed into the appropriate dyeing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_PACK
string.body: •Please place the item to be wrapped in the appropriate wrapping position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_SEAL
string.body: •Please place the item, to be sealed in the appropriate sealing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_UNSEAL
string.body: •Please place the item whose seal is to be removed into the appropriate position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_ENCHANT
string.body: •Please place the material item to be used for buffing into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_EXCEED_ENCHANT
string.body: •Please place the material item to be used for evolution into the appropriate position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_ENCHANT_OPTION
string.body: •Please place the material item to be used to boost Manastones into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_PROC
string.body: •Please place the material item to be used for DP buffing into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_LUNAID_DEF_STORY_NAME
string.body:
The creatures that Madrunerk created in his

experiments appeared through this passage.

It is the last bastion in battle against the

spread of the zombie virus throughout all Atreia.

string.name: STR_LUNAID_SIEGE_STORY_NAME
string.body:
This is a weapons factory,

which the crazy doctor ordered his servants to build

in the mountains. You have to fight him before

he is able to build his dangerous machine monster.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_Under_02_War_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
Elyos and Asmodians will face off for a limited time in this Instanced Zone.

Transform yourself into a Shugo and collect components for the machine weapon. You win if you gain more points that the opposing faction.

All enhancing effects are removed when entering the Instanced Zone.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_Fortress_War_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
An Instanced Zone is a place in which a battle between the Elyos and the Asmodians will take place for a limited period of time.

The side which unseals the most Rune Relics and scores the most points will win.

All enhancing effects will disappear upon entry to the Instanced Zone.

string.name: STR_STIGMA_ENCHANT_CONFIRM_OPTIONBUFFEVENT_STIGMA
string.body:
Do you want to boost %0%?

If the Stigma Gain effect is active and a boost fails, the level is not reduced to 0, but only by 1 level.

Stigmas with level 0 will also not be further reduced if the boost fails.

string.name: STR_LUNA_ABYSS_TRAINNING_DESC
string.body: This is the training area for the fortress battle.

string.name: STR_LUNA_WARDROBE_EXPAND_CONFIRM
string.body:
You will need %luna0% to add more spaces in the wardrobe.

Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_LUNA_WARDROBE_REG_CONFIRM
string.body:
You can store %0% in the wardrobe and use it to change the appearance of various items.

%0% will be deleted from the inventory and can only be used in the wardrobe.

Storing items in the wardrobe is only free of charge at the beginning. A fee will be charged to exchange items of clothing. Do you want to store the item in the wardrobe?

string.name: STR_LUNA_WARDROBE_CHANGE_CONFIRM
string.body:
Do you want to remove the %1%, which is stored in the wardrobe, and exchange it for %0%?

%0% will be deleted from the inventory and can only be used in the wardrobe.

You will need %luna2% to make the trade.

Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_LUNA_WARDROBE_CHANGE_SKIN_DONE
string.body:
The appearance of %0% is changed to %1%.

As long as the appearance change of an item in the wardrobe is still in effect, this item cannot be handled or saved in the Account and Legion Warehouse. Moreover, the soul-binding cannot be removed for the item. It can be attached to mail or wrapped, and its appearance cannot be changed.

Do you want to continue changing the item's appearance?

string.body: The box with the mysterious supplies is only available free of charge once every day, akakak.

string.name: STR_LUNA_CLOSET_GOSSIP_02

string.name: STR_LUNA_ID_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Hey, would you like to go on an adventure with me?

string.name: STR_LUNA_ID_GOSSIP_02
string.body: There are rumours that there are many mysterious materials on Madrunerk's Island.

string.name: STR_LUNA_REWARD_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Shugo's name is Munirunerk, akakak... The more Luna Daeva uses, the more gifts Shugo will give Daeva!

string.name: STR_LUNA_REWARD_GOSSIP_02

You can craft the material free of charge once every day.

Afterwards, you will need Luna to craft .

string.name: STR_HIGHREFORM_EMPTYSLOT
string.body:
•Place the item which is to undergo a Magical Morph into the central position.

•Only High Daeva items can be used for the Magical Morph.

•The type of morphing result is identical to that of the initial item.

string.name: STR_HIGHREFORM_TARGET
string.body:
•The Morph item was registered.

•You must register at least one material item for the Magical Morph.

•Material items must be of the same type as the initial item.

string.name: STR_HIGHREFORM_CAN_REFORM
string.body:
•You can register up to 6 material items.

•Items which were employed for morphing have been used up.

•Caution: Used items cannot be restored.

•The result may vary depending on the value or the quantity of the item.

•With a little luck, you might acquire extra rewards.
